name: Cactus Farming Simulator 2014
description:
Hi there!

Welcome to Cactus Farming Simulator 2014!

If your game starts to lag, there are probably too many cactuses. Hit Esc then R to restart, or prune your cacti with Right Mouse.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Use Tool

Right Mouse - Delete

1 - Select Cactus Tool

2 - Select Water Tool

F - Fast Forward

E - Build House

Q / ESC - Quit / Restart

X / C or Num-/Num+ Change Tool Strength

This game isn't done. Honestly, I don't even know what 'done' would mean for this thing. I've been learning UE4 as I go along, and having some fun playing around with this game, so hopefully you'll also enjoy getting weird with Cactus Farming Simulator 2014.

Questions? Comments? Problems? Get at me on Twitter, www.twitter.com/dinosaursssssss
